sub_title: Head of Solutions | IT Strategy | Digital Governance | AI | Cloud | Data | Digital Architecture | Low-Code | Building FinTech SaaS for ESG & Sustainable Finance | Management Consulting
summary:
Swatantra is an accomplished IT leader with a proven track record of success in developing, delivering innovative solutions that drive business outcomes. With extensive experience as a product manager, solution architect, and software engineer, Swatantra possesses a broad hands-on IT strategy, and technology experience.

Throughout Swatantra's career, entrepreneurial spirit has been a guiding force. From establishing and managing a development and web hosting business at a young age to pursuing various digital ventures, Swatantra has consistently demonstrated the ability to take products from inception to successful delivery. Working with enterprises across different domains and geographies across the globe from Canada and Australia and everything in between, Swatantra has played a pivotal role in planning, implementing, and building applications that meet the unique needs of each organization.

• Solution Architect with versatile IT experience in all facets of Web development life-cycle providing solutions to listed organizations, leveraging technology for the competitive advantage
• Applies best practices to critical business processes driving Continuous Improvement and forward-thinking across the complete process
• Functional experience in BFSI, Retail and e-Commerce, Media, Travel Tourism and Airline
• Managing projects in Agile Scrum methodology and enjoying close interaction with stakeholders
• Expertise in overseeing the entire process of building digital identities, from project specs to product. Focuses on web strategies, information design, technical implementation, client-oriented results, and project analysis, with a strong emphasis on standards and scalability
• Understanding pain points and recommending IT Transformation Roadmaps, defining implementation standards, and keen solution instinct and uncanny intuition for creating strategies

Tech stack:
✳️ C#, ASP.NET, PHP, Python, Ruby, React, Angular, TypeScript
✳️ OutSystems, Mendix, Power Platform
✳️ MSSQL, MySQL, Oracle, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Memcached, Redis, Elasticsearch, Solr, Cassandra, RabbitMQ
✳️ ERP, CRM, ESB, GDS, APM, SOA, microservices, ORM
✳️ Git, CI, CD, DevOps, Jenkins, Ansible, Docker, K8, SonarQube
✳️ CDN, Azure, AWS, LoadBalancer, ETL

Specialties:
Value Consulting, IT Strategy, IT Governance, TOM, Digital Transformation, Cloud Computing, Data strategy, Solution design, IT Architecture, Engineering design/analysis, Legacy modernization, Operational Excellence, Strategic Planning, Program Management, Stakeholder management, Conflict resolution, Leadership, People management

projects.title: Sustainable Investment Framework Navigator app
projects.description:
Measuring the impact of investment decisions is essential in the transition to a sustainable economy. Sustainable Investment Framework Navigator app is an online tool that helps measure the sustainable investment outcomes of portfolios and provides insight into the impact of investments on people, the environment and society. It measures the alignment of investment portfolios with sustainable development goals (SDGs). The tool meets the demands of a broad range of investors seeking greater insight into the societal and environmental impacts of individual investments and the impacts at a portfolio level. It provides an instant dashboard on the sustainability of a fund.

The Navigator can be used for:
- Gaining insights into the current impact of an investment portfolio, and to track changes in its impact over time
- Reporting the impact of an investment portfolio to both internal and external stakeholders
- Assessing asset managers according to the impact of their investment portfolio, instead of strictly focusing on the more traditional approach

projects.title: Consumer credit product's Interest rate - Remediation compensation calculator
projects.description:
One of the world’s largest cooperative financial institution was running a remediation program to compensate approximately 200K customers for the mismatch in the variable interest rate compared to the central base rates from their consumer credit products over the period.

✔️ Lead the team reviewing the Interfaces between source systems and the tooling around it to ensure complete and accurate data processing. 
✔️ Performed source code analysis on remediation calculator and connected systems to validate the correct implementation of calculation rules.
✔️ Reviewed the data cleansing rules and validated the data quality through sampling.
✔️ Reviewed the data exchange between Data warehouse and core system, data transformation rules and functional process.

projects.title: GlobeRunner | Cloud based Gamified Learning app
projects.description:
As a large, global organization with 200,000 employees in 154 member firms across the globe, we at KPMG have a challenge ensuring that our employees understand the full range of capabilities the organization offers across audit, tax, and advisory. In response, we created a gamified app to help employees learn about the global network of member firms’ capabilities in an engaging way. GlobeRunner improves awareness of our service offering.

Using game elements to engage learners, encourage behavior and help achieve organizational objectives. App has been played by more than 46,000 players. Users across 40 countries had more than 4 million questions answered about our service offerings.

projects.title: Derivatives Interest rate - Reassessment calculation engine
projects.description: Rentederivaten project is a custom-made complex financial calculation web app for one of the worldwide top 50 banks. The independent derivatives committee has drawn up a recovery framework which determines how the bank should carry out assessments and what possible remedial actions should be carried out to compensate SMEs who have concluded interest rate derivatives contracts. This web-app legally complies the Uniform Recovery Framework for Interest Rate Derivatives (UHK) for 10K+ SME customers and 11K+ dossiers. The implementation has been done in consultation with the Netherlands Authority for the Financial Markets (AFM) and an independent assessor mandated by the AFM.

projects.title: ClientReady | Interactive Learning SaaS solution
projects.description:
ClientReady is an interactive learning and quiz platform based on a complex decision tree. The objective of this digital tool is to improve the rate in which employees increase their knowledge across their sectors and clients resulting in increased confidence when engaged in conversations with clients. App provides quick and engaging learning experiences. 

The app is based on Multi-Tenant SaaS Architecture and quantifies improvement through data acquisition and metrics. The app is highly available, scalable and has service offerings to 120+ countries with more than a million interactions.

projects.title: UpperEast | Advanced Content Delivery | OTT Deliveries
projects.description:
UpperEast enables content owners and distributors to monetize video content through the most advanced, high-quality onboarding, digitization and packaged distribution service for high-value video content at the most competitive prices. It has already transformed how quickly and efficiently some of the biggest content owners deliver to all major cinemas, broadcasters and VOD platforms (including iTunes, Netflix, Google Play, Hulu, XBOX Live and Amazon Prime). It can now radically simplify and accelerate these same processes for business, along with simultaneously and seamlessly distributing your content to multiple platforms globally. The whole process can be tracked via UpperEast web app which demands just 1 upload to deliver to all platforms. 
- Automated Quality Control according to delivery specs 
- Transcode the asset according to platform specs
- Packaging by collecting all assets for delivery
- Delivery package to VOD platforms
- Assets are automatically stored in digital archives and can be redelivered on demand
- Technical and commercial aggregation service to iTunes

Tech
- Provides a Software as a Service (SaaS) video platform
- Microservices based architecture
- Each components communicates through an API layer
- Multiple API integration endpoints
- Fully automated DevOps (CI/CD)

projects.title: Cox & Kings | Data Warehouse ETL | Data Mining – Content & Media Caching
projects.description:
CNK has its various B2C2B portals and micro sites powered by 14+ years of legacy systems; these were outdated and end-of-support platforms. The objective of the project was to make a centralized in-memory content system which may provide any content say data, images and media over network with speedy delivery by caching them.
- Redis Enterprise: Managed to achieve SET: 850K requests per second, GET: 1.2M requests per second on a high-end machine using pipelining. Used a partitioning approach over shard clustered Redis database using the Redis Enterprise API. Also used Twemproxy (Twemproxy, a Redis proxy from Twitter) running on a multi-core Linux machine with several Redis instances. Out of the box, both pipelining and Lua scripting are good avenues for improving performance with Redis server.
- Oracle UCM (Universal Content Manager): Placed all un-cached raw images and static files on Oracle WebCenter Content (ECM)
- Akamai CDN: Cached the images and large files on Akamai Media Delivery and Storage network map across various regions over 350+ PoP
- Used seaborn as high-level interface for drawing attractive and informative statistical data visualization and drawing heatmap
